snippet: Parents of high school students killed in the capsizing of a South Korean ferry marched on the office of President Park Geun-hye in Seoul on Friday as prosecutors continued to try to determine who was responsible for the accident that killed hundreds...
abstract: Parents of high school students killed in capsizing of South Korean ferry march on office of Pres Park Geun-hye in Seoul as prosecutors continue to try to determine who is responsible for the accident.
lead_paragraph: Parents of high school students killed in the capsizing of a South Korean ferry marched on the office of President Park Geun-hye in Seoul on Friday as prosecutors continued to try to determine who was responsible for the accident that killed hundreds of people.

headline.main: South Korea: Victims’ Parents Assail President Over Government’s Response to Ferry Accident
headline.print_headline: South Korea: Victims’ Parents Assail President Over Government’s Response to Ferry Accident
